bio:treatment.description: Plants loosely cespitose; innovations extravaginal; blades lax, flat or convolute; ribs obscure to prominent; sclerenchyma girders present at the major veins. Calluses longer than wide, bearded with a ring of hairs; lemmas chartaceous, minutely bidentate, awned; ovary apices densely pubescent.
bio:treatment.discussion: Only one species has been placed in this section.
